summary: An ordinance providing for the issuance of refunding bonds of the City of Seattle for the purpose of refunding and repaying bonds of said city which will mature July 1, 1915, known as "Seattle Refunding Bond of 1913 - 2nd Series", in the sum of One Hundred Thousand ($100,000) Dollars, and providing for the issuance and sale thereof and the levy and collection of taxes for payment of the principal and interest thereof.
